successes.title: Bring back the legendary Trioplan soap bubble bokeh f2.8/100
successes.description: Recapture the beauty, art and essence of the 'soap bubble' bokeh with the new Trioplan f2.8/100 for DSLR and mirrorless cameras

Pledges.description: Be part of the Trioplan f2.8/100 community!  Pledge $1 and join us as we bring back and update this unique lens-  which was originally created in 1916. As one of our backers you will be updated on developments and news, and you’ll also have access to the new Trioplan Photography School!
Download the soap bubble bokeh love! Receive our thanks along with a download of three exclusive downloadable digital wallpapers taken with the new Trioplan f2.8/100.
Share the soap bubble bohek love! We'd like to thank you for supporting us by sending you a set of three postcards of exclusive prints taken with the new Trioplan f2.8/100.

Wear the soap bubble bokeh love! Receive an exclusive limited edition t-shirt choose from (1) “You don't take a photograph, you make it.” ― Ansel Adams (2) Congratulations, it's triplets! The re-birth of the Trioplan f2.8/100 (3) Stop, smell the roses, appreciate the bokeh... (4) OMG MOG
Receive a limited edition canvas print (12.5" by 8.5") of a canvas soap bubble bohek print (canvas on wooden frame) - select one of three options taken with the new Trioplan f2.8/100 lens
Stay dry and inspired! An exclusive golf-sized umbrella  with an exclusive 'soap bubble bokeh' image taken with a Trioplan f2.8/100 lens. Made with durable frame, and pistol grip handle.

Share the bokeh love with this 24x20 inch photograph on a canvas frame. Choose from one of five limited designs created using the legendary Trioplan f2.8/100 lens. Also receive a hand-written thank you from the Meyer Optik Goerlitz manufacturing team in Goerlitz
VERY EARLY BIRD LAUNCH SPECIAL. Get your hands on a new Trioplan f2.8/100 lens with this really special reward to thank you for acting so fast!
EARLY BIRD LAUNCH SPECIAL Get the new Trioplan f2.8/100 lens as an amazing special launch reward
EARLY BIRD LAUNCH SPECIAL 2 Get the new Trioplan f2.8/100 lens as an amazing special launch reward
EARLY BIRD LAUNCH SPECIAL 3!! Get the new Trioplan f2.8/100 lens as an amazing special launch reward
EARLY BIRD LAUNCH SPECIAL!! Get the new Trioplan f2.8/100 lens as an amazing special launch reward
Celebrate the relaunch and rebirth of the new Trioplan lens for a special price for this amazing and unique soap bubble bokeh lens.
Celebrate the relaunch and rebirth of the new Trioplan lens for a special price for this amazing and unique soap bubble bokeh lens.

Celebrate our historic date with a date of your own!  Trioplan lens Kickstarter special edition engraved with special serial number that show a date: birthday, anniversary, graduation, or any other special date and optional name (up to 30 characters)

The Trioplan was first made in 1916. Mark history with the new Trioplan by having one of the first new Trioplans specially made for this Kickstarter project, your lens will be marked with the production number between [K01 and K30] to show the order of when it was hand-made in Germany. Numbers will be allocated on a first-come-first-served basis, so you will receive the number that relates to when you backed this reward, starting at B01).  For ealier Trioplans being produced, please see the rewards below

Collector's item!
For the Trioplan lens fan with a sense for history: Own one of the first Trioplans to be manufactured in almost 100 years, have a piece of history in your hands with a new Trioplan f2.8/100 lens marked from 2 to 10.

Come to Goerlitz!  An exclusive photography trip-of-a-lifetime to the beautiful town of Goerlitz, come and meet the team, see the birthplace of the Meyer Optik brand, see our production facilities of the new Trioplan f2.8/100, be presented with a new Trioplan f2.8/100 lens and a rare old Trioplan lens in an exclusive handmade bag. Then join one of our 'soap bubble bokeh' specialists to experience what you can do with your new Trioplan f2.8/100 lens
